q7.question: Leakage from what was a challenge for the B-52 aircraft?
q7.recall: Leakage was a challenge for the B-52 aircraft.
q7.vectordb: The challenge for the B-52 aircraft was leakage from its fuel tank seals, which caused a fire in the left wing. The crew had to bail out, but the pilot, Lt. Colonel Holland, rode the plane down to a belly landing on the snow. He was trapped in the wreck for days before being rescued.
